name: STLplus C++ library collection
short_description: Containers to extend STL: graph, tree, matrix, smart-pointer. Persistence (serialisation) of C++ data structures. Portability: subprocesses, TCP, file system. Reusable subsystems: library manager, message handler. Portable between OSs and compilers.
